title: J. M. Bundsch Catalog, Chicago.
content:
Hi I'm looking for a typographical catalog, which as I references, was published before 1943, by JM Bundsch Chicago.  
Someone knows him or has pictures of it. Thank you.
author: ugerpol

comments.content: The name is actually J. M. Bundscho. Google ebooks has several, different dates. Perhaps one of them is what you are seeking.

Thank you Thank you!  
Now I found some pictures.  
regards
